name: Morning Alarm Ritual
description:
Can you survive your Morning Alarm Ritual? You've got 10 seconds to decide what to do...

Simple controls - move left and right arrows, select up arrow and you're done!

Playtest feedback welcome.  Should we build and polish this prototype "10 second game"? Or consign it to the Trash Can? You Be the Judge! 

Made in 3 days by 3 students , so go easy on us:

Isaac Boon - programming, concept

Ruby Griffin - Original artwork and concept

Jayne Gale - UI and backup everythin
